snippet: White tape peeking out from under the red sweat band on his injured left wrist, Rafael Nadal was back in action Sunday, playing his first match in 2½ months....
lead_paragraph: White tape peeking out from under the red sweat band on his injured left wrist, Rafael Nadal was back in action Sunday, playing his first match in 2½ months.

headline.print_headline: Left Wrist 'Not Perfect,' Rafa Nadal Wins Return at Olympics
headline.main: Left Wrist 'Not Perfect,' Rafa Nadal Wins Return at Olympics
